= Setup the workflow on Mac OS X =

== Install Pandoc ==

# Download pandoc-1.13.*-osx.pkg (about 27MB) from https://github.com/jgm/pandoc/releases.
# Double click the pkg file to install Pandoc.

== Install MacTeX ==

# Download MacTex.pkg (about 2.3GB) from http://www.tug.org/mactex/.
# Double click the pkg file to install MacTeX.

== Install Fonts ==

# Download TeX Gyre Termes family fonts from http://www.gust.org.pl/projects/e-foundry/tex-gyre/termes.
# Download Chinese fonts AdobStongStd, AdobHeitiStd, AdobeFangsongStd and AdobKaitiStd. A download link is http://download.csdn.net/download/wpc0000/6762849.
# Unzip and double click to install those fonts.
# Install zhfonts module. A reference is https://gist.github.com/weijianwen/4a3794946982f4cc0b31.

Now it should be okay for your Mac OS X to compile Markdown and LaTeX files with Pandoc.
